text: Ham andhoṅ kī tarah dīwār ko hāth se chhū chhū kar rāstā mālūm karte haiṅ, āṅkhoṅ se mahrūm logoṅ kī tarah ṭaṭol ṭaṭol kar āge baṛhte haiṅ. Dopahar ke waqt bhī ham ṭhokar khā khā kar yoṅ phirte haiṅ jaise dhundalkā ho. Go ham tanāwar logoṅ ke darmiyān rahte haiṅ, lekin ḳhud murdoṅ kī mānind haiṅ.
